name: jodit
description: Jodit is awesome and usefully wysiwyg editor with filebrowser

scripts.concat: concat-cli -f jquery.jodit.js config.js modules/* plugins/* build/jquery.jodit.full.js
scripts.github: git add .  && git commit -m "new version $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags origin HEAD:master && npm publish
scripts.build: npm run concat && npm run minify
